com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers

Class EnumSerializer<T extends Enum<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.Serializer<T>
      • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.SimpleSerializer<T>
        • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.EnumSerializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The enum type managed by this serializer.

    public class EnumSerializer<T extends Enum<T>>
extends SimpleSerializer<T>
    An XML serializer for any enum type, using Enum.toString() and Enum.valueOf(Class, String). If this behaviour is not sufficient, SimpleSerializer can be subclassed instead of using this class.
    Author:
    Joffrey BION

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.SimpleSerializer

        BOOLEAN, BYTE, CHARACTER, DOUBLE, FLOAT, INTEGER, LONG, SHORT, STRING

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        public T deserialize(String s)
                              throws ParseException
        Description copied from class: SimpleSerializer
        Retrieves an object from the specified String.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in class SimpleSerializer<T extends Enum<T>>
        Parameters:
        s - The String to convert, which is guaranteed not to be null, though it may be equal to "null".
        Returns:
        The created object.
        Throws:
        ParseException - If the String cannot be parsed as an object of the class handled by this serializer.
